name: library_license_checker
description: Checks license compliance for Python (.py) and Java (pom.xml, build.gradle) projects.

functions.name: check_licenses
functions.description: Returns license details and trust levels for imported libraries in a Python file.

arguments.file_path: Path to the Python file to analyze.
arguments.export: Whether to export the results to an Excel file.
arguments.output_path: Optional path to save the Excel file (default: license_report.xlsx).

returns.description: List of libraries with license and trust metadata.
